Package amuse.nodes.processor.methods.reducers

Class Summary
BeatPruner Performs beat reduction of the given feature files
DataSampler Performs sampling of the given feature files
IntervalSelector Selects only the features from a given interval
NaNEliminator Replaces NaN feature values with the median values
NormalizerWithGivenMinMax Performs standard normalization of given features using the given minimal and maximum values for each feature.
OnsetPruner Performs onset reduction of the given feature files
PrincipalComponentsAnalysis Performs principal components analysis of the given features
TatumPruner Performs tatum reduction of the given feature files
ZeroMeanUnitVarianceNormalizer Performs zero mean - unit variance normalization
